title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6401.4 - Time limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6401.4 - Time limitations

State Regulations
(a) Submission of the formal request. The
formal request to appeal, as defined in section
6401.1
(e) of this

Part, must be received by the executive director not later than 5 p.m. on the
21st day after the date of the notification letter. (b) Submission of the materials. The
materials, as defined in section
6401.1
(f) of this

Part, must be received by the executive director not later than 5 p.m. on the
date specified in the reply letter as the deadline for submission of the
materials. This date shall be not less than seven days after the date of the
reply letter. (c) Calculation of
days. Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays are to be counted in computing the
number of days. (d) Noncompliance. Failure by the applicant to comply with any deadline will result in the loss of
the right to continue the appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6401.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
